original_text: And they brought up the ark of the Lord, and the tabernacle of the congregation, and all the holy vessels that were in the tabernacle, even those did the priests and the Levites bring up.
korean_text: 여호와의 궤와 회막과 성막 안의 모든 거룩한 기구들을 메고 올라가되 제사장과 레위 사람이 그것들을 메고 올라가매

sentences.original_text: And they brought up the ark of the Lord
and the tabernacle of the congregation
even those did the priests and the Levites bring up
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들과 레위 사람들이 그것들을 메고 올라갔더라
